item.title: Running mod_wsgi on Windows
item.description: Overview Running Apache/mod_wsgi on Windows can be a bit tricky. There are four requirements that you need to satsify. You need to ensure that you are using either 32 bit (Win32) versions of everything or 64 bit (Win64) versions of everything. You cannot mix 32 bit and 64 bit binaries. That the Python version you are using was installed for all users and not just the user that installed Python.
